meanings.definition: The study of life in the universe beyond Earth.
meanings.sent1: Astrobiologies explore the possibility of life on other planets.
meanings.sent2: Scientists in astrobiologies search for signs of life in outer space.
meanings.sent3: The class on astrobiologies made me wonder if aliens could be real.
meanings.sent4: Her fascination with astrobiologies was as vast as the universe itself.
meanings.sent5: The mysteries of astrobiologies captivated the young students.

meanings.definition: The scientific study of the potential for life beyond Earth.
meanings.sent1: Studying astrobiologies involves looking for life forms in space.
meanings.sent2: Astrobiologies aim to understand the conditions for life outside our planet.
meanings.sent3: The idea of astrobiologies being taught by aliens would be amusing.
meanings.sent4: His passion for astrobiologies was like a rocket launching into the unknown.
meanings.sent5: The concept of astrobiologies painted a picture of life among the stars.
